page.title: 03EVENTS
page.content: The carnival is an annual event.It is a procession through the town and every year there is a different subject or theme that you have to dress up to.There are two catagories of entry;walking or by float.People decorate the floats with paper flowers,sheets and scenery.The floats go in the council offices and the pedestrians go into the Vineyards to be judged.There are usually four or five judges.The Round Table organizes the whole carnival including the fete afterwards.A few selected marching bands are included as every participant processes through the main street of the town.
